mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM , USER_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_REGDATE , BOARD_READCOUNT , BOARD_NOTICE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) AS RN , BOARD_NUM , USER_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_REGDATE , BOARD_READCOUNT , BOARD_NOTICE FROM BOARD ) WHERE CEIL(RN/5) = #{pnum}
SELECT BOARD_NUM , USER_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_REGDATE , BOARD_READCOUNT , BOARD_NOTICE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{board_num}

SELECT RN , BOARD_NUM , USER_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_REGDATE , BOARD_READCOUNT , BOARD_NOTICE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_REGDATE DESC) AS RN , BOARD_NUM , USER_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_REGDATE , BOARD_READCOUNT , BOARD_NOTICE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NOTICE = 'Y' ) WHERE RN < 4
SELECT COMMENT_NUM , BOARD_NUM , USER_NUM , COMMENT_CONTENT , COMMENT_REGDATE , COMMENT_REFER , COMMENT_RE_CHECK FROM BOARD_COMMENT WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{board_num} ORDER BY COMMENT_REFER , COMMENT_NUM
